
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
cor_matrix<-cor(SAQ8)
sum(diag(cor_matrix))
eigen1<-eigen(cor_matrix)
eigen1$values
comp_matrix<-t(t(eigen1$vectors)*sqrt(eigen1$values))
sum(comp_matrix[,1]^2)
sum(comp_matrix[1,1:2]^2)
sum(comp_matrix[2,1:2]^2)



pca1<-princomp(SAQ8,cor=T)
pca1$loadings
sum(pca1$loadings[,1]^2)

pca1$sdev^2
dim(pca1$scores)
var(pca1$scores[,1])
cor(pca1$scores[,1],SAQ8[,1])

pca1$loadings
summary(pca1)

names(SAQ8)
summary(lm(q01 ~ ., data=SAQ8))

FA$loadings
FA$scores
```
